answers.2: about the fourth labor, these things also are reported
answers.3: About the fourth labor, which we told above, these things also are reported
answers.4: Hercules was making his journey into Arcadia
answers.5: he came to that region which the centaurs were inhabiting
answers.6: While Hercules was making his journey into Arcadia, he came to that region which the centaurs were inhabiting
answers.11: He received Hercules kindly and prepared dinner
answers.12: But after Hercules dined, he demanded wine from Pholus
answers.16: Pholus therefore did not want to give this wine, because he was afraid of the other centaurs
answers.18: This Wine, "He said, has been entrusted to me
answers.19: If therefore I give this the centaurs will kill me
